snippet.title: Slime Survivor
snippet.description:
A silly mobile Gear VR game I made in uni with a bunch of other students (in a 2-week game marmalade). I was in charge of the music, this trailer and I mainly acted as one of the two programmers. The trailer is way too long, but I completely deny that it's done on purpose just so you can hear the music in full :D The music had to be put together very quickly in like a weekend, so I'm sorry if it feels rushed!

Music Download:
http://www.SCENDO.nl/
